title: Abomination of Gudul
description: Whenever Abomination of Gudul deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

structure.title: Pre Consent Form
structure.body: Do you agree to begin the experiment?

prompts.title: Remove distractions
prompts.text: Our patented underground bunkers will let you work productively, even in the event of nuclear war. (batteries not included)

prompts.title: Need to run?
prompts.text: In case of attack by lizard people, press F1 to exit the experiment and choose privacy settings for your video. (helpful if the lizard people don't consent to be recorded)

structure.title: Final Notice of Consent
structure.body: Do you agree to finish the experiment?
structure.consentLabel: I am disinclined to the reverse negation of the decision to not cease the termination of the test

title: Absolver Thrull
description: When Absolver Thrull enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, destroy target enchantment.

title: Barbarian Bully
description: Discard a card at random: Barbarian Bully gets +2/+2 until end of turn unless a player has Barbarian Bully deal 4 damage to him or her. Activate this ability only once each turn.

title: Carnivorous Death-Parrot
description: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Carnivorous Death-Parrot unless you say its flavor text.

title: Withengar Unbound
description: Flying, intimidate, trample (A creature with intimidate can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Whenever a player loses the game, put thirteen +1/+1 counters on Withengar Unbound.

title: Worldspine Wurm
description: When Worldspine Wurm dies, put three 5/5 green Wurm creature tokens with trample onto the battlefield. When Worldspine Wurm is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

title: Deadly Grub
description: Vanishing 3 (This permanent enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.) When Deadly Grub dies, if it had no time counters on it, put a 6/1 green Insect creature token with shroud onto the battlefield. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

title: Faerie Mechanist
description: When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

title: Centaur Rootcaster
description: Whenever Centaur Rootcaster deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
